lead_paragraph: STEINBERG--Roslyn. An absolute wonder. Warm, bright, fun and so loving - a non-stop, utterly captivating, whirlwind, in love with life and all of its possibilities. We knew how lucky we were, and never stopped adoring you. Always will. Thanks for being an incredible Mom. Love, Michael and Vicki 1/3
